title: Salisbury
summary: Salisbury (locally /ˈsɔːzbəri/ SAWZ-bər-ee)[lower-alpha 1] is a cathedral city in Wiltshire, England, with a population of 40,302,[1] at the confluence of the rivers Avon, Nadder and Bourne. The city is approximately 20 miles (32 km) from Southampton and 30 miles (48 km) from Bath.
